      private void PayrollProcessing.addEmployee(Company company, Employee employee)
      Checks a provided company to see if an employee is present, and adds them to the company if they are not in the database.

      Checks if given company has zero employees.
      private boolean PayrollProcessing.isHoursValid(java.lang.String[] empInfo, Company company, Parttime employee)
